content: step out in style this winter with this dazzling crochet hooded cowl it provides excellent protection against cold weather offering both neck and head coverage you ll learn the beginner-friendly mosaic crochet technique and produce a fashionable accessory that you ll be proud to wear or give as a gift **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this hooded cowl pattern in an ebook with 59 additional crochet patterns 32 graphs and 14 videos right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/mosaic-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry > please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites
